about_the_game:
You have become a "Mochi".
A perfectly round "Mochi".
Navigate through 2D scrolling dungeons, avoiding brutal traps, and single-mindedly aim for the goal .

Gameplay

■ Simple controls with only lateral movement and jumping
However, precise control is required, so the difficulty level is high.
Increasing the game speed in the game settings will make it an even more challenging game.

■ About the Trial Version
You can play up to stage 2 in Normal mode.
The game speed can also be changed up to x1.5.
For those who want to explore further, please purchase the full version.

Video Streaming

・Streaming is allowed without permission for both individuals and corporations.
・Monetization is only allowed when using features provided by video streaming platforms.
・We would appreciate it if you include the name of the game in the title or description of the video, and if you include a link to the Steam page in the description.

We do not take any responsibility for damages caused by streaming videos of this game.
Furthermore, the contents of this guideline are subject to change without notice.

name: Mochi Sprint Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You have become a "Mochi". Navigate through 2D scrolling dungeons, avoiding brutal traps, and aim for the goal (mortar).
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Turkish, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Malay
